name: A. MEX Destruction
input: InputEach test contains multiple test cases. The first line contains the number of test cases $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \le t \le 200$$$). The description of the test cases follows. The first line of each test case contains a single integer $$$n$$$ ($$$1 \le n \le 50$$$), the length of $$$a$$$.The second line of each test case contains $$$n$$$ space-separated integers, $$$a_1, a_2, \ldots, a_n$$$ ($$$0 \le a_i \le 100$$$).It is guaranteed that the sum of $$$n$$$ over all test cases does not exceed $$$500$$$.
output: OutputFor each test case, output a single integer on a line, the minimum number of operations needed to make $$$a$$$ contain only zeros.
